Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO REAL PROPERTY TAXATION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO REAL PROPERTY TAXATION
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO REAL PROPERTY TAXATION
REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS
AMEND BY RESTORING TO ORIGINAL PRINT 9673
AMENDED BY RESTORING TO PREVIOUS PRINT 9673A

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Directs the department of taxation and finance to conduct a study on the implementation of local land value taxation
Summary: Directs the department of taxation and finance to establish a pilot program for implementation of local land value taxation based on classes of land; directs the department of taxation and finance to establish an application procedure for the pilot program.
ActClause: AN ACT to direct the department of taxation and finance to establish a pilot program for implementation of local land value taxation
